name: Bakemono (Grochlin)
description:
Can you prepare the dough to end all doughs? Prep ingredients for your dough and throw them in the mixer, when the time is up your very own Bakemono will come out of the oven! Test your mettle against the vicious Practice Dummy!

-------------------------------------

Controls:

left click: interact

right click: switch screens

----------------------------------------

Gameplay:

The game has two phases. You will start in the kitchen, where you pick ingredients from the shelf and place them in the prep area. 

-Each ingredient is currently only compatible with one tool, so you'll have  to experiment to figure out where something goes. 

- A kitchen tool can only hold one ingredient at a time

- Pot : Cooks an ingredient over a set amount of time. Ingredient will burn if allowed to sit too long in the pot

- Knife: Mash on the cutting board to slice an ingredient

- Mortar: Hold the mouse button and move the cursor over the mortar to grind an ingredient

- Pan: Cooks an ingredient over a set amount of time. Hold the mouse button and move the cursor over the pan to keep the ingredient from burning

- When an ingredient is finished click on it to pick it up again

- To the right of the prep area is a mixer and trash can

- You can throw away unwanted ingredients in the trash

- Place cooked ingredients in the mixer to add to your Bakemono's stats

When your kitchen time is up, you and your new Bakemono will have a dual at sunset with the monstrous Practice Dummy. Mash the big button to muster all your power!

------------------------------------------
